process.name: Boundry Loop
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_1" name="Start Event" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":null}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_4</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="node_2" name="Form Task" pm:screenRef="5" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_4</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_11</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:ioSpecification id="node_2_inner_1638423509731">
        <bpmn:dataInput id="node_2_input_1" name="array" isCollection="true"/>
        <bpmn:inputSet id="node_2_inner_1638423509733">
          <bpmn:dataInputRefs>node_2_input_1</bpmn:dataInputRefs>
        </bpmn:inputSet>
        <bpmn:outputSet id="node_2_inner_1638423509734"/>
      </bpmn:ioSpecification>
      <bpmn:multiInstanceLoopCharacteristics id="node_2_inner_1638423509730">
        <bpmn:loopDataInputRef>node_2_input_1</bpmn:loopDataInputRef>
      </bpmn:multiInstanceLoopCharacteristics>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_9" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_11</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_11" name="" sourceRef="node_2" targetRef="node_9"/>
    <bpmn:boundaryEvent id="node_12" name="Boundary Signal Event" attachedToRef="node_2">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_15</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:signalEventDefinition signalRef="collection_1_update"/>
    </bpmn:boundaryEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="node_13" name="After Boundary" pm:screenRef="5" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_15</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_21</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_15" name="" sourceRef="node_12" targetRef="node_13"/>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_19" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_21</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_21" name="" sourceRef="node_13" targetRef="node_19"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_4" sourceRef="node_1" targetRef="node_2"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmn:signal id="collection_1_update" name="persons_update"/>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="ProcessId">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_1_di" bpmnElement="node_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="110" y="160" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_2_di" bpmnElement="node_2">
        <dc:Bounds x="390" y="140" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_9_di" bpmnElement="node_9">
        <dc:Bounds x="570" y="160" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_11_di" bpmnElement="node_11">
        <di:waypoint x="448" y="178"/>
        <di:waypoint x="588" y="178"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_12_di" bpmnElement="node_12">
        <dc:Bounds x="488" y="179" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_13_di" bpmnElement="node_13">
        <dc:Bounds x="400" y="270" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_15_di" bpmnElement="node_15">
        <di:waypoint x="506" y="197"/>
        <di:waypoint x="458" y="308"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_19_di" bpmnElement="node_19">
        <dc:Bounds x="580" y="290" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_21_di" bpmnElement="node_21">
        <di:waypoint x="458" y="308"/>
        <di:waypoint x="598" y="308"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_4_di" bpmnElement="node_4">
        <di:waypoint x="128" y="178"/>
        <di:waypoint x="448" y="178"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn:definitions>

config.label: Content
config.helper: The HTML text to display

config.label: Visibility Rule
config.helper: This control is hidden until this expression is true

config.label: Custom Format String
config.helper:
Use the Mask Pattern format
Date ##/##/####
SSN ###-##-####
Phone (###) ###-####

config.label: CSS Selector Name
config.helper: Use this in your custom css rules

config.label: Aria Label
config.helper: Attribute designed to help assistive technology (e.g. screen readers) attach a label

config.label: Tab Order
config.helper: Order in which a user will move focus from one control to another by pressing the Tab key

config.name: Variable Name
config.label: Variable Name
config.helper: A variable name is a symbolic name to reference information.

config.label: Label
config.helper: The label describes the field's name

config.name: Data Type
config.label: Data Type
config.helper: The data type specifies what kind of data is stored in the variable.

config.name: Data Format
config.label: Data Format
config.helper: The data format for the selected type.

config.label: Validation Rules
config.helper: The validation rules needed for this field

config.label: Placeholder Text
config.helper: The placeholder is what is shown in the field when no value is provided yet

config.label: Helper Text
config.helper: Help text is meant to provide additional guidance on the field's value

config.label: Text Color
config.helper: Set the element's text color

config.label: Background Color
config.helper: Set the element's background color

config.label: Default Value
config.helper: The default value is pre populated using the existing request data. This feature will allow you to modify the value displayed on screen load if needed.
